spatial_accuracy.notes: Major mismatch between 2D plan and 3D layout. The 2D plan shows distinct Central Hall, WC, Utility Room (with WH/HVAC), Kitchen, Pantry, Dining Room, and a right-side bay/window-seat condition; the 3D render depicts a largely open-plan space with only a couple of small back/left rooms. Wall runs/jogs and room boundaries do not align, door locations/opening directions are not represented correctly, window locations/count do not match the plan, and overall proportions (relative room sizes and corridor widths) are substantially distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Multiple required rooms/partitions from the plan are missing or merged. Adjacency relationships are incorrect (e.g., WC/Utility/Hall relationships are not preserved). Doors are shown as generic openings without matching the plan’s embedded door positions and swings. No clear representation of plan-specific wall thickness transitions; exterior footprint/jogs (alcove/breakfast/bay/window-seat geometry) are not faithfully modeled.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen casework is generic and not mapped to the plan’s detailed kitchen/pantry configuration. A kitchen island and dining set are present but are not verifiably placed per the 2D plan (which emphasizes built-ins and specific areas like pantry/window seat). Furniture/appliance scale appears plausible but does not reflect the plan’s exact layout constraints.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric render with acceptable lighting and generally tidy geometry. However, it is not a faithful architectural/isometric translation of the provided plan; projection feels more like a stylized cutaway than a strict plan-based model. Overall clarity is good, but accuracy-driven composition is weak.

detected_errors.description: Missing WC room and its fixtures (toilet/sink) shown in the 2D plan.
Missing Utility Room subdivision details (WH/HVAC/crawlspace access) shown in the 2D plan.
Missing Pantry room/closet volume adjacent to the kitchen as labeled in the 2D plan.
Room placement mismatch: Central Hall/Dining/Kitchen partitioning in 3D does not correspond to the 2D plan’s wall layout.
Proportion distortion: relative sizes of Dining Room vs Kitchen vs circulation zones do not match the plan dimensions/relationships.
Exterior footprint mismatch: plan shows specific jogs/alcove/breakfast-side geometry and right-side bay/window-seat condition not reflected in 3D.
Door placement errors: openings in 3D are not located to match the plan’s door positions (e.g., hall-to-WC, hall/utility transitions, kitchen connections).
Door orientation error: 2D plan indicates specific door swings; 3D uses swing-less openings/incorrect implied orientations.
Window placement/count mismatch: 3D shows two windows on the right wall; the plan indicates different window arrangements including a bay/window-seat condition.
Hallucinated open-plan configuration: 3D merges spaces that are clearly separated by walls in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated kitchen island not indicated in the provided 2D plan segment.
